練.definition: to practice; to train; to drill; to perfect (one's skill); exercise; (literary) white silk; to boil and scour raw silk

練功.definition: to do tai chi; to practice kung-fu (or other martial art); to train (for dancing, acrobatics etc)

練習.definition: to practice; exercise; drill; practice; CL:個|个[ge4]

練習場.definition: driving range (golf); practice court; practice ground
